item.title: About
item.description: Hi folks.. I am an Information Analyst with an interest in programming, cycling and beer. I am new to the blogging business so not sure how I will fare with it.. However, you can find some of my other musings on one of the following platforms:

item.title: Maze Generator à la Shiffman
item.description: I am a big fan of Daniel Shiffman’s work and particularly like his YouTube channel Coding Challenges. One of the “challenges” is the creation of a Maze Generator using p5.js, the JavaScript implementation of the Processing language/package. In this short article you can find my implementation of the Maze Generator à la Shiffman. Run the Maze Generator below or head down to view the code. Maze Generator Hosted on OpenProcessing.

item.title: Publications
item.description: 2015 Potential of faba bean starch for distilled spirit production Enhancing the economic potential of beans using Vicia faba L.: Crop performance and the use of air-classified grain components in animal feeds and brewing 2015 Potential of faba bean starch for distilled spirit production Authors: G Walker, J Ianieri, M Moench, G Palomba, P Iannetta Abstract: Faba bean (Vicia faba L. minor, also known as field beans) are a grain legume species with great potential in terms of the capacity to improve human and animal nutrition as they are rich in starch, protein and minerals (Fig.
